Till er som undrar, de så kallade cracket ligger finner ni i "Deviance" mappen på skivan nu just brännt ut. Därefter kopierar ni den filen och lägger den i grundmappen (Postal 2). Nu kommer ni få en förfrågning om ni vill kopiera över *.exe filen, och då svarar ni ja.

Alltså, kopiera de så kallade cracket ifrån "Deviance" mappen (markera och Ctrl+C) därefter klistrar ni in den i Postal 2s grundmapp (Ctrl+V). Och slutligen på frågan ni får ska ni klicka "JA" på!

Så, hoppas det löser sig nu!

OKAY!!! This works for me so I've made a STEP BY STEP INSTRUCTIONS.

You will need....
1. PowerISO or other image mounting program.
2. A spare disk (optional)

how to Install.
1. Download Torrent
2. Open the downloaded Postal2 STP.ISO file with PowerISO
2a. you could burn it to a disk, using PowerISO but you won't be able to autorun it. if you do skip to 4. otherwise carry on....
3. Extract the files from the .ISO file tempory folder by going Action>Extract, select all files and then put them to a place you prefer.
4. Open the file you just extracted or Burned (Right Click Open if Burned to disk) and find Setup.exe Doubleclick.
5. follow the onscreen Instructions to install Postal 2.
6. Before you enjoy, go into the file you extracted in step 3 and find cracked Postal2.exe in DEViANCE folder.
7. Now Swap the cracked Postal2.exe with the one the NON cracked Postal2.exe in C:\Program Files\Postal2STP\System (or where you installed it)
8. Start the cracked Postal2.exe and play.
9. (OPTIONAL) you could make a shortcut of the cracked Postal2.exe onto your desktop for easy acess. I know I did.

Hope this helped.
